name: SOCIAL WELFARE & RURAL DEVELOPMENT SOCIETY
briefDescription: Social Welfare & Rural Development Society is located in West Bengal. It is a very remote area encircled by river on three sides. It is a flood prone agricultural area and most of the people belong to illiterate poverty strikken landless poor depending on daily earnings. poverty made their life unhygienic and miserable. To remove this illiteracy at poverty through sustainable development the Society emphasises on education, health and income generation programmes keeping an eye to have a better Social and economic life.
